xxA car is stopped at an intersection with a red light and a biker (in a bike lane) with velocity v is approaching the car. When the biker is a distance d from the intersection, the light turns green and the car begins to accelerate at a constant acceleration a. If biker just barely catches up to the car as the car accelerates, how far from the intersection will the biker just catch up to the car?
Put your answer only using the variable d, not v and a.
